query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Literature and OSS review
result.description: This report contains a comprehensive and systematic review of the scientific literature on onestopshops as well as literature on topics with relevance to the business model of onestopsshops The deliverable will also report on existing onestopsshops and their business model as well as failed onestopsshops and possible reasons for their failure
